itemselectr 0.1
  • Reference

Performs a differential item functioning analysis of polytomous items using ANCOVA

dif.ancova.Rd

Differential item functioning analysis of polytomous items via ANCOVA

Usage

dif.ancova(data, Trait, Group)

Arguments

data

A data frame containing the items. All the items should be scored in the same direction.

Trait

A vector containing measures of the trait. This may be the total scores across all the items, the mean item scores, factor scores, or IRT person measures.

Group

A factor indicating group membership

Examples

library(lordif)
data(Anxiety)
### Perform the dif analysis
out <- dif.ancova(Anxiety[4:32], rowSums(Anxiety[4:32]), Anxiety$gender) 
out
